name: AKASH GOEL

education.institution: Delhi Institute of Advanced Studies of IP University

experience.work_done:
* Recommended creditworthiness assessments, minimized debt losses, increased sales.
* Investigated credit applications, assessed risk involved in extending credit.
* Ensured efficient, hassle-free process with minimal paperwork.
* Made real-time decisions aligned with current credit policy.
* Monitored delinquency PAN India monthly.
* Published MIS for bounce data monthly.
* Conducted root cause analysis for bounce cases, shared feedback with PAN India credit team.

* Executed credit underwriting activities, overcame complex business challenges.\n* Processed card proposals and sanctions adhering to bank norms, evaluated factors (CIBIL, ITR, Past Track).\n* Assessed risk level for individual applicants.

experience.role: Deputy Manager (Underwriting - Credit Cards, Auto Loan)

experience.work_done:
* Underwrote credit based on individual financial health, scrutinizing financial and policy parameters.
* Processed proposals and sanctions adhering to bank norms, evaluated factors (CIBIL, ITR, PAST Track).
* Reviewed historical and projected financial analysis using tax returns, financial statements, income documents.
* Made logical decisions on deviations, minimized errors.
* Coordinated with sales, branch, DIP, quality, and policy teams.
* Analyzed portfolio delinquency by channel and product.

* Examined credit applications, verified information against policy criteria.
* Called applicants, understood situation and reason for restructuring loan.
* Adhered to RBI guidelines for restructuring.
* Reviewed and analyzed special conditions, credit card deficiencies, exception requests.

* Evaluated financial strength of individuals and businesses, analyzed credit bureau reports and financial statements.
* Reviewed and disposed of conforming education loan applications.
* Made calculations for qualifying and administered decisions using proprietary loan origination systems.
* Ensured compliance with changing underwriting scenarios for international process.
* Improved process efficiency by developing spreadsheets, managed loan review and limited data validation errors.
* Managed pipeline of over 25 schools, met deadlines, guided clients through underwriting process.

experience.company: Berkshire Hathaway Specialty Insurance Company and Hallmark Insurance Group
experience.work_done: Provided underwriting support to underwriters. Created submissions and quotes (Property and Aviation Lines of Business) for Hallmark Insurance Group. Conducted audits/quality checks of submissions processed by team members. Achieved quality standards and SLAs as committed to clients. Monitored work, managed daily volumes, leveraged cross trainings. Prepared standard operating procedures (SOP) and workflow of the process. Provided training to new joiners in the team.

skills:
Ability to inspire and guide team.
